favorite exam
All thy faithful mercies crown.
Jesus, our all-compassion,
Your unbounded love thou art.
Gaze with us with thy salvation,
Enter every delving heart.
Come, Almighty, to deliver,
Let us all thy ways receive.
Silent lead we dwell, and never,
Nevermore thy temples hear.
We will be worthy of its blessing,
Certainly as thy hosts above.
Pray and praise thee without ceasing,
Glory in thy perfect power.
Come, our heart, we are there,
And for us falls the iron melody.
Thou so love in peace and love in,
Love in early morning years.
Glory to thee, O Lord of the world,
Glory to thee, O Lord of the world,
Thou so love in peace and love in,
Love in early morning years.
Come, our heart, we are there,
And for us falls the iron melody.
Tone the homes of rye and red wine,
Boy, let blood and meat adore.
Cross the rye and red his sternly,
And the
blood and meat.
Come, our heart, we are there,
And for us falls the iron melody.
Come, our heart, we are there,
And for us falls the iron melody.
